short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a Picture-in-Picture button to YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of being stuck on YouTube's fullscreen mode? Our extension adds a convenient Picture-in-Picture button to YouTube videos, allowing you to watch videos in a floating window while browsing other content. Enjoy multi-tasking and uninterrupted viewing!

Key Features:

1.One-click Picture-in-Picture: Easily activate Picture-in-Picture mode with a single click.
2.Resizable window: Adjust the size of the floating window to fit your screen.
3.Draggable window: Move the window anywhere on your screen for optimal viewing.
4.Pause/play controls: Easily pause or resume the video from the floating window.
5. Seamless integration: Works seamlessly with YouTube's player controls.
Install our extension today and experience the freedom of Picture-in-Picture on YouTube!
